ViewObject.Name: XxcsoPlanMonthListVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT TO_CHAR(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate, 'MM') plan_month ,TO_CHAR(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate, 'FMMM') || 'ŒŽ' plan_month_view ,TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate, 'MM')) plan_month_index FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate, 1), 'MM') plan_month ,TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate, 1), 'FMMM') || 'ŒŽ' plan_month_view ,TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate, 'MM')) + 1 plan_month_index FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate, 2), 'MM') plan_month ,TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate, 2), 'FMMM') || 'ŒŽ' plan_month_view ,TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate, 'MM')) + 2 plan_month_index FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate, 3), 'MM') plan_month ,TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate, 3), 'FMMM') || 'ŒŽ' plan_month_view ,TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate, 'MM')) + 3 plan_month_index FROM DUAL
